entries.meaning: Any pain in the belly, stomach, or abdomen.
examples: Eating too much candy can give you a bellyache.

verbs.description: bellyache (third-person singular simple present bellyaches, present participle bellyaching, simple past and past participle bellyached)

entries.meaning: To unnecessarily complain or whine, often about simple matters.
examples: Quit bellyaching about the problem and help us fix it.
